EzCollateral Web Solutions, LLC

Your Sources of Verification and Collateral Contacts just got easier.
You’re welcome.

Who we are.

Burnout and compassion fatigue are just some of the challenges facing Child Protection Workers. We worked closely with these heroes and heroines. We witnessed the outdated methods they used to collect information, and the stress caused by not getting their Collateral Contacts and Sources of Verification back in a timely manner.

That’s why we developed the EzCollateral workflow application.

Our daily mission at EzCollateral Web Solutions, LLC is to support Child Protection Workers, Case Managers, Social Workers and their teams streamline data retrieval.

You’re welcome. ☺

 We make answering your questions and concerns our top priority.  Contact us today to see how we can help support your mission.  We can upload your existing forms, or you can browse through our library of comprehensive data collection tools. Whatever you decide, we’re here.   Our product is 100% web based and accessible from any device.  Simply fill out the form and one of our team members will contact you shortly.

Partnered with you,

Vanessa Jean-Louis

Founder & CEO 
Eliminate those Headaches Today!
